===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ほしょう|kyu=保證}}

# a [[guarantee]] or [[warranty]] for a product
# legal assumption of responsibility

{{ja-verb-suru|ほしょう|kyu=保證}}

# to [[assume]] legal [[responsibility]], to [[swear]]
